abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single configuration is allowed

user.title: API Configuration
user.description:
To prevent your password from leaking, it is recommended to deploy the API service yourself.
Free deployment guide: https://neteasecloudmusicapienhanced.js.org/

user.title: Configuration
user.description:
The linked media player must support custom music sources. You can test availability using a TTS plugin.

[Note] This sets your preferred maximum audio quality. Actual playback quality depends on your account privileges.
Warning: Hi-Fi/special audio formats require device decoding support. Unsupported devices may result in silence or playback failure.
